text: The Christian Cynosure was a newspaper in existence from 1868 to 1983.http://onlinebooks.library.upenn.edu/webbin/serial?id=christcyno Published in Chicago by the National Christian Association of Jonathan Blanchard, it was devoted to opposing secret societies such as the Freemasons and The Grange, featuring "emotional tirades and exposés which explained to God's servants why they should not belong to any secret organizations". ==Notes== ==External links== *Archive (1868 to 1923) Category:Defunct newspapers published in Chicago Category:Publications established in 1868 Category:Publications disestablished in 1983 Category:1983 disestablishments in Illinois Category:Anti-Masonry
title: Christian Cynosure
